PROGRAM DATA SHEET
Tape Recording Exchange Project
NOTE: Send to Department of Audio-Visual Instruction, National Education Association,
1201 Sixteenth Street, Northwest, Washington 6, D* C*, one copy of this form for each
program series or individual program which you wish to submit to the DAVI-AERT Radio '
and Recordings Committee* Submit only programs of unusual quality and of national
significance*
